attributes.additional_details:
2am 4am so on going back and fourth to mosque and waking up my child is not great!
There are too many mosques !!! And not enough respect for other religions!

SORT THIS OUT!!!!! We need respect and Muslims should follow the same rules as everyone else!!!
I would like there to be a cap on how many mosques can be put in one town and when they can and can't open just like a bar cannot stay open all night!!!!
